subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tim Floyd will stay on as Southern California’s coach, spurning an offer by Arizona. He was offered the job Wednesday to replace the Arizona interim coach Russ Pennell, who took over when the Hall of Famer Lute Olson retired for health reasons before the start of the season. “I listened, I heard what they had to say,” Floyd said at a U.S.C. campus news conference. “But there is something really special about building your own traditions and your own history.”.
